title: How Can I Switch Between Several Ongoing Calls?
answer:
This function requires the network to support the call holding function. When a call is held and the other call is ongoing, you can do as follows:
? Press the answer key to switch between the two calls, that is, hold the ongoing call and unhold the held call.
? Press the end key to end the ongoing call and keep the held call.
? Press the left soft key to display the option menu, and then select End all calls to end both calls.
